title: Surrender vote glitch ?
body: So my group of 4 friends were playing a CO-OP vs AI game, and my friends decided to randomly troll and cast a surrender vote. It got to 3-1 and apparently my last friend didn't vote, yet he said when the surrender timer got to 0 a "Surrender vote successful, 4-1" message came up without him pressing anything, or the last green light even appearing, so we lost the game. Is this possible?

replies.body:
Surrendering bot games is the best, though.

I've never had this happen to myself. I know that if a player is 'disconnected' then only three votes are need to surrender, but obviously the player wasn't. It would be really frustrating if this happened in a real game.
